name: AgentBox
description: AI engineering agent powered by OpenClaw. Executes code, runs analysis, manages workflows, searches the web, calls APIs, creates and reads documents (DOCX, XLSX, PDF), and sends email with attachments.

skills.name: Execute Task
skills.description: Execute any AI agent task: run code, search the web, analyze data, manage files, call APIs
examples: Search the web for the latest news on quantum computing
Write and run a Python script to analyze this CSV data
What files are in the workspace?

skills.name: Send Email
skills.description: Send email with optional attachments via himalaya (SMTP2GO relay)
examples: Send an email to user@example.com with the quarterly report attached
Email the analysis results to the team

skills.name: Create Document
skills.description: Create or read Microsoft Word (.docx) documents, convert DOCX to Markdown
examples: Create a Word document with the project proposal
Convert this DOCX file to Markdown

skills.name: Create Spreadsheet
skills.description: Create or read Microsoft Excel (.xlsx) spreadsheets with formatting, formulas, and multiple sheets
examples: Create an Excel spreadsheet with the sales data
Build a budget spreadsheet with formulas
Read and summarize the data in report.xlsx

skills.name: Read PDF
skills.description: Extract text, tables, and metadata from PDF files, convert to Markdown
examples: Extract the text from this PDF
Pull the tables out of the financial report PDF

skills.name: Create PDF
skills.description: Generate PDF documents with text, tables, images, headers, and footers
examples: Create a PDF report with the analysis results
Generate an invoice as a PDF
Build a PDF summary with tables and charts
